name: Blah Blah Blah!!!
description:
Enjoy your tea time avoiding nonsense talk of your wife. Made for Trijam #156: The 3 hour game jam.

Find out what the man has to say for different moods he finishes the tea time in.

Use arrow <- or -> to dodge.

Music: Happy -7 by Centyś

Made in javascript: https://github.com/aloksbd/blah-blah-blah
